title: Recidivism Watch: Clinton’s repeated claim that the FBI said her answers were ‘truthful’
subtitle: Clinton continues to twist a statement by the FBI director to wrongly suggest the FBI declared that her public remarks on the email issues were truthful.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
